languages.text: "Прорве покровительствует Губительная жажда — не самый многочисленный, но уважаемый и старый культ ведьм. Во главе его стоят три Суккубы — Тазарра, Кикеросс и Синисториа, самая влиятельная из них. Но Тазарра недавно пропала, а Синисториа держится в тени последнее время, с тех пор, как она заключила союз между своим культом и Опустошительной бурей. Так что на арене распоряжается смертоносная Кикеросс".

"The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Sinisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."
languages.original_text: "Прорве покровительствует Губительная жажда — не самый многочисленный, но уважаемый и старый культ ведьм. Во главе его стоят три Суккубы — Тазарра, Кикеросс и Синисториа, самая влиятельная из них. Но Тазарра недавно пропала, а Синисториа держится в тени последнее время, с тех пор, как она заключила союз между своим культом и Опустошительной бурей. Так что на арене распоряжается смертоносная Кикеросс".

Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Synisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Synisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

"The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Synisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Synisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

"The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Synisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

"The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Sinisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

languages.text: “裂隙的主宰是‘致命饥渴’教派。尽管它不是规模最大的巫灵教派，但却是个古老而受人尊敬的教派。它的首领是三位血腥魔女：塔扎菈、绮克萝丝，以及三位魔女之中最有影响力的希斯索莉亚。不过，塔扎菈不久之前失踪了。希斯索莉亚自从她的教派与狂风阴谋团结盟之后，就一直在低调行事。因此，竞技场的工作由绮克萝丝全权负责。”
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Sinisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

traits.locale_text: “裂隙的主宰是‘致命饥渴’教派。尽管它不是规模最大的巫灵教派，但却是个古老而受人尊敬的教派。它的首领是三位血腥魔女：塔扎菈、绮克萝丝，以及三位魔女之中最有影响力的希斯索莉亚。不过，塔扎菈不久之前失踪了。希斯索莉亚自从她的教派与狂风阴谋团结盟之后，就一直在低调行事。因此，竞技场的工作由绮克萝丝全权负责。”

languages.text: «El Abismo está en manos de la Sed Letal. No es el Culto de Brujas más grande, pero sí es antiguo y respetado. Está liderado por tres súcubos: Tazarra, Keykeross y Sinisthoria, la más influyente de todas. Pero Tazarra desapareció hace poco y Sinisthoria se esconde desde que forjó una alianza entre su Culto y la Tempestad Asoladora, por lo que la mortífera Keykeross está a cargo de la arena».
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Sinisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

traits.locale_text: «El Abismo está en manos de la Sed Letal. No es el Culto de Brujas más grande, pero si es antiguo y respetado. Está liderado por tres súcubos: Tazarra, Keykeross y Synisthoria, la más influyente de todas. Pero Tazarra desapareció hace poco y Synisthoria se esconde desde que forjó una alianza entre su Culto y la Tempestad Asoladora, por lo que la mortífera Keykeross está a cargo de la arena».

languages.text: 「亀裂は死の渇きの管轄にある。最大の魔女団ではないが、古くから尊敬されている。タザーラ、キーケロス、そしてもっとも影響力のあるシニストリアの3人のサキュバスが率いている。だが、タザーラはしばらく前に行方不明になり、シニストリアは彼女の魔女団と略奪の嵐と同盟を組んで以来、身を潜めている。なので、現在は凶暴なキーケロスが闘技場を仕切っている」
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Sinisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

traits.locale_text: 「亀裂は死の渇きの管轄にある。最大の魔女団ではないが、古くから尊敬されている。タザーラ、キーケロス、そしてもっとも影響力のあるシニストリアの3人のサキュバスが率いている。だが、タザーラはしばらく前に行方不明になり、シニストリアは彼女の魔女団と略奪の嵐と同盟を組んで以来、身を潜めている。なので、現在は凶暴なキーケロスが闘技場を仕切っている」

languages.text: "Die Kluft wird vom Fatalen Durst regiert — nicht der größte Hekatarii-Kult, aber ein alter und angesehener. Drei Sukkubi führen ihn an — Tazarra, Keykeross und Sinisthoria, die einflussreichste von allen. Doch Tazarra ist vor kurzem verschwunden, und Sinisthoria ist abgetaucht, seit sie ein Bündnis zwischen ihrem Kult und dem plündernden Sturm geschmiedet hat. Darum leitet die tödliche Keykeross die Arena."
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Sinisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kluft wird vom Fatalen Durst regiert — nicht der größte Hekatarii-Kult, aber ein alter und angesehener. Drei Sukkubi führen ihn an — Tazarra, Keykeross und Synisthoria, die einflussreichste von allen. Doch Tazarra ist vor kurzem verschwunden, und Synisthoria ist abgetaucht, seit sie ein Bündnis zwischen ihrem Kult und dem plündernden Sturm geschmiedet hat. Darum leitet die tödliche Keykeross die Arena."

languages.text: « L'Abîme est contrôlé par la Soif Fatale, qui n'est pas le Culte Céraste le plus important, mais n'en reste pas moins ancien et respecté. On trouve à sa tête trois des succubes les plus influentes de toutes : Tazarra, Keykeross et Sinisthoria. Cela dit, Tazarra a disparu il y a quelque temps et Sinisthoria se fait discrète depuis qu'elle a convenu d'une alliance entre son culte et la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse. C'est donc la redoutable Keykeross qui dirige actuellement l'arène. »
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Sinisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."

traits.locale_text: « La Faille est contrôlée par la Soif Fatale, qui n'est pas le Culte Céraste le plus important, mais n'en reste pas moins ancien et respecté. On trouve à sa tête trois des succubes les plus influentes de toutes : Tazarra, Keykeross et Sinisthoria. Cela dit, Tazarra a disparu il y a quelque temps et Sinisthoria se fait discrète depuis qu'elle a convenu d'une alliance entre son culte et la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse. C'est donc la redoutable Keykeross qui dirige actuellement l'arène. »

languages.text: "Yarık, Ölüme Susamışlık tarafından kontrol ediliyor. En büyük Viç Tarikatı olmas da köklü ve saygındır. Başında üç sakkubus bulunur: Tazarra, Keykeross ve Sinisthoria. Bu sonuncusu, en nüfuzlu olandır. Fakat Tazarra yakın bir geçmişte ortalardan kayboldu. Sinisthoria ise kendi tarikatıyla Müfteris Kasırga arasında ittifak kurduktan beri ses seda çıkarmıyor. Yani arenayı ölüm kusan Keykeross yönetiyor."
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is controlled by the Fatal Thirst — not the biggest Wych Cult, but an old and respected one. Three Succubi stand at its head — Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria, the most influential of all. But Tazarra disappeared not long ago, and Sinisthoria's been lying low ever since she forged an alliance between her Cult and the Reaving Tempest. So the deadly Keykeross is in charge of the arena."
